text.text_translated: Based on these findings, we recommend that Girox Foods should use a management style that is more focused on its people. As part of this, we should look for ways to offer working hours that can change to suit employees. We should also consider how we can allow employees to work from the locations they choose. Managers need to find different ways to challenge their staff, and they should also provide more positive feedback and praise for the work that they do. Spending more money on professional training can also help create a positive environment for employees. This training should especially focus on social and communication skills to help them do their best work.
